attributes.action: Uphold democracy and maintain the EU referendum result.
attributes.additional_details: The fact that a petition exists to negate the democratic process our country has just been through is disturbing. The fact that a petition is even needed to uphold democracy is worse.
attributes.background: We have just been through the highest turnout democratic action in decades yet many call to ignore it. Uphold democracy and continue with the motion to leave the EU as per the Referendum result.
